column1: #Text=Unalaq says : " The Avatar is dead , and we can not open the Northern portal .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " How do you know ?
#Text=" Vaatu says : " Even though my connection to Raava was severed , I can still feel her presence .
#Text=" Vaatu says : " The Avatar will find you .
#Text=She has just entered the Spirit World .
